title: Anan, Tokushima
text:
is a <a href="Cities%20of%20Japan">city</a> in <a href="Tokushima%20Prefecture">Tokushima Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. The city was founded on May 1, 1958. As of June 1, 2019, the city has an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 70,405 and a <a href="population%20density">population density</a> of . The total area is .
On March 20, 2006, the towns of <a href="Hanoura%2C%20Tokushima">Hanoura</a> and <a href="Nakagawa%2C%20Tokushima">Nakagawa</a> (both from <a href="Naka%20District%2C%20Tokushima">Naka District</a>) were merged into Anan.
<a href="Nichia">Nichia</a>, a global <a href="Light-emitting%20diodes">LED</a> and electronic materials manufacturer has its headquarters in the city. Also in the city is the static inverter plant of <a href="Kii%20Channel%20HVDC%20system">Kii Channel HVDC system</a>.
